entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
